description:
Dolugh and Chuta successfully update after a strenuous battle. Because of the update, they have powered up, can use new abilities, and have started their counterattack. Meanwhile, some confusion was happening back at the bureau. Personnel throughout the bureau suddenly started attacking their own. Chief Laine sends out a code 9 on the matter in order to calm the panic going on.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ceux en qui on croit, partie 3
シンジラレルモノ・その3
